awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 12 nominations.

fullplot: "Dottore" Joe Moretti travels round Sicily doing screen tests for the big Roman studios. He's a conman and takes money or favours for his efforts. Beata, a young illiterate convent girl desperately wants to change her life and falls for him, belatedly he realises his feelings for her. Their love affair is doomed when he's arrested.
plot: A photographer and the types of people he encounters.
title: The Star Maker
